attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite its flippant nature this petition has a serious point. Either by direct payment of the licence fee, or satellite/cable subscription, or through  the indirect effect of advertising the British public pay for their television. Therefore, we should not tolerate the bland, opinion-less rubbish served to us.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
